risks.divergence_summary: The internal policy focuses on employee-level working time compliance, which is too narrow and does not explicitly address the organization's overarching responsibility to ensure all policies comply with new regulations by the December 31, 2025 deadline.
risks.conflicting_policy_excerpt: Employees must comply with their assigned working schedules, record their working time honestly and report any situation likely to exceed legal limits.
risks.new_rule_excerpt: All organizations must comply by December 31, 2025
risks.recommendation: Review and update the policy to explicitly reference the organization's commitment to regulatory compliance and ensure its provisions align with the December 31, 2025 deadline.
